name: Slayer Shock
description: A role-playing shooter about hunting vampires in Nebraska. Take missions to patrol the streets, rescue captive humans, and weaken the undead threat. Assemble a team, hunt the vampires, and save your hometown!
minimum_requirements: OS: Vista or newer Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0-compliant device with 512MB memory Storage: 150 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Vista or newer Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Dedicated graphics card, GeForce 200/Radeon HD 4000 series or better Storage: 150 MB available space
